title: Why aren't Andrew Yang’s ideas making a lot of sense to most people? - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: I haven’t read his book so I’m no expert on his ideas other than what he expressed during the debates. BUT everything he said during the debates made sense and seemed practical and constructive. Unfortunately, the press and he, himself, initially spent too much time repeating the $1000/month mantra which may have branded him as simplistic or reductionist to those who didn’t listen critically. I would love to see him as president or veep and I’m going to buy a bumper sticker that says “VOTE YELLOW MENACE!”
